trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的页导航行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the FormViewPagerRow is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: FormViewPagerRow 的实例创建来保存中的页导航控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the FormViewPagerRow control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>接口是一个标记，指示 FormViewPagerRow 控件是否属于<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象的控件层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此类主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>构造函数和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>类创建自定义页导航行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow"></xref> class.
The FormViewPagerRow constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: FormViewPagerRow 构造函数调用基类构造函数， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>，使用指定的参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the call is made `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>中控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件，调用了`rowType`等于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>和`rowState`等于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
